text: Dr Jozef Gécz is a senior researcher at The University of Adelaide studying the various mutations of a small part of the X chromosome that lead to mental retardation.Associate Professor Jozef Gécz, PhD, Laboratory Head, Neurogenetics Research Program Scientists crack genetic link to intellectual disabilitySam Gécz, science.org.au Gécz was elected Fellow of the Australian Academy of Health and Medical Sciences (FAHMS) in 2015 and SA Scientist of the Year for 2019. ==References== ==External links== * https://www.sagenomics.org/jozef-gecz * http://genome-2018.p.asnevents.com.au/speaker/239202 Category:1962 births Category:People from Bratislava Category:Australian neuroscientists Category:Living people Category:University of Adelaide faculty Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Fellows of the Australian Academy of Health and Medical Sciences
